member.name: T:s4pi.DefaultResource.DefaultResource
member.summary: A resource wrapper that "does nothing", providing the minimal support required for any resource in a Package.

member.name: M:s4pi.DefaultResource.DefaultResource.#ctor(System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Create a new instance of the resource.
member.param: Data stream to use, or null to create from scratch

member.name: M:s4pi.DefaultResource.DefaultResource.UnParse
member.summary: does not know how to parse anything, so this method is unimplemented.

member.name: P:s4pi.DefaultResource.DefaultResource.RecommendedApiVersion
member.summary: Return the version number that this wrapper prefers to be called with (the default if passed zero).
member.remarks: This wrapper returns 1 and is not sensitive to API version.

member.name: P:s4pi.DefaultResource.DefaultResource.Stream
member.summary: The resource content as a Stream, with the stream position set to the begining.

member.name: M:s4pi.DefaultResource.DefaultResourceHandler.#ctor
member.summary:
Populate the Dictionary.
"*" is used to inform WrapperDealer this will happily wrap any resource.
